author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Pathankot Air Base attack should not derail India-Pakistan peace process, former Prime Minister H.D. Deve Gowda said here on Monday.

He did not think the Pakistan government had actively or covertly supported the attack. Pakistan had condemned the attack already.

He said he supported Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s peace initiative. His steps were in the right direction. The proposed foreign secretary-level talks should continue as scheduled.
title: Talks must continue: Gowda
